LocalizationMap.Term: An error occurred while getting a file from Elvis because of a lost connection. (S1144)#EOL#Please do the following:#EOL#• Contact your system administrator#EOL#• Wait until the connection is restored before trying to access the file again#EOL#• Do not attempt to open or save files that are stored on Elvis#EOL#• Do not attempt to open or save layouts or Dossiers that contain files that are stored on Elvis
